english.segment1: "it is easy to promise, and alas! how easy to forget!". -alfred de musset
english.segment2: chasing words. are you still frightened. heard you called. caught my wanderings. thought they'd see. see it my way
english.segment3: broken words. i am frightened now
english.segment4: we could stand together if i'd just speak out. we could find a meaning on this torn blue couch
english.segment5: broken mouth. a fortune to make up. sickened heart. all for you my love. thought you'd see. see it my way. in turn. we'll sing out loud
english.segment6: we could stand together if i'd just speak out. we could find a meaning on this torn blue couch
english.segment7: in my head the reasons are all on display. i could tell you everything but not today
english.segment8: please don't ask why till we rise. your dreams are mine.
